channel.title: eLiquid Blends – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Create Your Own (legal) Blend
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Mix and match single-note tobacco flavor concentrates to come up with your own unique blend.
item.content:encoded: This is your opportunity to climb into the cockpit of our sophisticated on-demand lab. Is she all we claim her to be? Armed with Cloud Chemistry’s proprietary “Custom Handmade-to-Order” eLiquid manufacturing processes, our elite lab techs are at your disposal: Your wish is their command. If you think it, they can mix it. Proceed with caution, however: With great power, comes great responsibility.

item.title: Neutron
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Nougat and white chocolate and almond, oh my.
item.content:encoded: White chocolate and toasted almond play off each other perfectly on the inhale, while the creamy nougat carries a delicate sweetness on the exhale.

item.title: Hydrogen
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A cold, crisp blend of mints and menthol.
item.content:encoded: An invigorating blend of mints and menthol designed to tickle the lungs of chill seekers. It is customary to give this blend the cold shoulder.

item.title: Potion
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A tropical blend featuring pineapple and kiwi, with a berry finish.
item.content:encoded: Potion is a sweet, tropical blend that will inject sun and fun into any day. Pineapple and kiwi wed together for a happy marriage of sweet and tangy. Gentle tones of berry are then added to compliment the kiwi; and floral honeysuckle comes in to help maintain and round out the blend for that satisyfing exhale.

item.title: Node
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A sweet and tangy cherry candy.
item.content:encoded: Cherry lovers, look no further: Node is the answer to your heart’s desire. This sweet mixture features no less than four distinct types of cherry, with an ever so subtle note of raspberry for added depth. On the inhale, the cherry medley is more than happy to make its home in your mouth. As you begin to exhale, the raspberry softens up the sweetness, while preserving the unique integrity of the blend.

item.title: Titan
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A pear and citrus blend to enliven the senses.
item.content:encoded: This blend is a worthy embodiment of its namesake. On the inhale, you’ll encounter pronounced notes of sweet tangerine and mango. While on the exhale, the citrus notes are tamed by the tender presence of ripe, juicy pear.

item.title: Alpha
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Cavendish tobacco blended with vanilla bourbon and caramel.
item.content:encoded: This recipe exudes sophistication. Nutty cavendish tobacco and smooth vanilla bourbon come together to form a symphony that would have most assuredly earned the admiration of Mozart. Alpha is the preferred blend of gentlemen everywhere for whom making a positive impression on their peers is paramount.

item.title: Neon
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of creamy vanillas with an assertive coconut finish.
item.content:encoded: Neon is an esteemed mix of creamy and arromatic vanillas, toasted coconuts, and savory butter rum. This blend is in a category all its own; and is commonly recommended to the intrepid palate who seeks to satisfy a curious craving.

item.title: Apocalypse
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded: Picture bite sized pieces of delicious blueberry french toast swimming merrily in a bowl of sweetened cream. This blend showcases warm, succulent blueberries and opulent french toast, for a vape that is ideal for either breakfast or a midday snack.

item.title: Crystal
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded: For Crystal, we blend together two types of strawberries, add a generous spritz of sweet rum, and top things off with a squeeze of tart lime. Right out of the gate you get the sweetness of the strawberries on the inhale. On the exhale is when the rum and tart lime cut the sweetness and carry the flavor home.
